sentence: We took a high floor and that made sense except for one day when two of the four elevators were not working here we go again with maintenance and were once taken to the service elevator

We finally got into the room around 230pm and once we got to the room the window had been leaking in several spots due to rain I called the desk and asked if they could put me in a different room or have maintenance come up and take a look at it and they said they were sold out and could bring me some towels which they never brought up
However the hotel is in need of upcoming renovations
Hotel could use some renovation
The hotel in going though a entrance refurbishing in fact that brings noise even for us staying on the 24th floor
Location1The hotel is under renovation so there was a lot of noise 2Check in usually too busy and space limited 3 internet connection was too bad
We were in a hurry and did not have time to wait for the maintenance people to correct the situation
When we stayed in July the lobby and pool were closed as they were under renovation
Noise of union protesters missing fridge safe in room no place or table in bathroom for toiletries and hotel under renovation which was not announced when registering for a room
I remember it mentioning on the mobile booking process that their lobby was going throw some renovation
Hotel was recently remodeled and the king room we stayed in had a great in room workout area
Really nice updated room decor

I travel to Chicago quite a lot and as this hotel was recently renovated I had been eyeing it up with the intention of giving it a try as you never know when you will run across your new favorite hotel and end up coming again and again
The remodel looks nice too
Our room was very nice and clean as well as updated and not to mention the CITY VIEW WAS BEAUTIFUL
Fantastic hotel just remodeled
Nice hotel that has been recently remodeled
Newly renovated rooms and great location
Everything has been updated and is truly a relaxing setting
Hotel was clean and updated
